Author: Aleph0-4
Text: If you think you might have an ED I think you should seek help from specialist because it tends to get worse the longer you leave it.

Author: beautiful_ashes
Text: An eating disorder is way more then the physical side of things as I'm sure you know. If your food intake or number on the scale or how much you did or did not exercise impacts your mood long term, it's a problem. If your value and the worth you give yourself comes as a result of food or food related behaviors, it is problematic.  Obviously, only medical providers can diagnose and eating disorder, but in general if you are obsessive about it, it creates anxiety and impacts your mood.....you may have one or be well on your way to developing one.
